description: Patagonia's most versatile technical top is built for use on the trail or the water. Stretchy, quick drying and with HeiQ® Pure odor control, it will keep you comfortable when you’re working hard in conditions ranging from cool to hot. Made with 50-100% recycled polyester and Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia Capilene Cool Daily Graphic Shirt - Lands - Mens
